articles.description: Driverless cars were once seen as core to the company's future but lately it's focused on rides and food.
articles.content:
image captionUber's self-driving car programme met with setbacks after a deadly crash in Arizona in 2018
Uber is selling its driverless car subsidiary to start-up Aurora Technologies, abandoning a u… [+2213 chars]

articles.title: Trump to sign Covid order preventing international access until Americans get vaccine - The Independent
articles.description: Order comes days before FDA reviews Pfizer’s emergency authorisation application for vaccine
articles.content:
Donald Trump is set to sign a Covidexecutive order preventing international vaccine assistance until Americans have received the shots, a report says.
